allowance(address,address).return: The amount of CELO owner is allowing spender to spend.

params.spender: The address which is being approved to spend CELO.
params.value: The amount of CELO approved to the spender.

params.owner: The address to query the balance of.

balanceOf(address).return: The balance of the specified address.

params.value: : The amount of CELO to burn.

circulatingSupply().return: The total amount of CELO in existence, not including what the burn address holds.

params.test: Set to true to skip implementation initialization

decimals().return: The number of decimal places to which CELO is divisible.

params.spender: The address which is being approved to spend CELO.
params.value: The decrement of the amount of CELO approved to the spender.

getBurnedAmount().return: The total amount of Celo that has been sent to the burn address.

getVersionNumber().return: Storage version of the contract.Major version of the contract.Minor version of the contract.Patch version of the contract.

params.spender: The address which is being approved to spend CELO.
params.value: The increment of the amount of CELO approved to the spender.

params.amount: The amount to increase counter by

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

params.to: The account for which to mint tokens.
params.value: The amount of CELO to mint.

name().return: The name of the CELO token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

symbol().return: The symbol of the CELO token.

totalSupply().return: The total amount of CELO in existence, including what the burn address holds.

params.to: The address to transfer CELO to.
params.value: The amount of CELO to transfer.

params.from: The address to transfer CELO from.
params.to: The address to transfer CELO to.
params.value: The amount of CELO to transfer.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.to: The address to transfer CELO to.
params.value: The amount of CELO to transfer.

allowance(address,address).notice: Gets the amount of owner's CELO allowed to be spent by spender.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve a user to transfer CELO on behalf of another user.

balanceOf(address).notice: Gets the balance of the specified address.

burn(uint256).notice: This function allows a user to burn a specific amount of tokens. Burning is implemented by sending tokens to the burn address.

methods.constructor: Sets initialized == true on implementation contracts

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: Decreases the allowance of another user.

getBurnedAmount().notice: Gets the amount of CELO that has been burned.

getVersionNumber().notice: Returns the storage, major, minor, and patch version of the contract.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: Increases the allowance of another user.

increaseSupply(uint256).notice: Increases the variable for total amount of CELO in existence.

initialize(address).notice: Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy.

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints new CELO and gives it to 'to'.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfers CELO from one address to another.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers CELO from one address to another on behalf of a user.

transferWithComment(address,uint256,stri.notice: Transfers CELO from one address to another with a comment.
